title: Colombo Port City (Management of Condominium Property) Regulations No.03 of 2024
decision_details: - According to the Master Plan of the Colombo Port City, 51% of the gross floor area has been allocated for residential use which will lead to the development of Condominium Properties. Accordingly, it has been required to establish a regulatory body and to impose regulations to maintain common amenities and elements at an international standard, providing seamless living for owners and tenants of the Condominium parcels. The Colombo Port City (Management of Condominium Property) Regulations No.03 of 2024 have been published through the Gazette Extraordinary Notification No.2394/68 dated 2024‑07‑26 as per the provisions of the Colombo Port City Economic Commission Act No.11 of 2021. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as the Minister of Investment Promotions to submit the said Regulations to Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
